title: All the Presidents Men (1976) Hoffman + Redford (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
aka
All the President's Men (1976) 
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074119/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074119/</a>

With Dustin Hoffman and Robert Redford

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Bulgarian, Danish, English, Finnish, German, Greek, Hebrew, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish, Swedish.
(Sorry, Dutch friends, your language was not on the DVD.)

With subtitles, only a full DVD seems to remain here on PB of this classic about one of the most dramatic political intrigues in newer history, winning 4 Oscars. So I made this new rip with multisubs.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x384, original mono sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
